programme.title: Uptown Saturday Night
programme.desc: Blue-collar buddies (Sidney Poitier, Bill Cosby) search the underworld for a winning lottery ticket lost in a nightclub holdup.

programme.title: Let's Do It Again
programme.desc: Two lodge brothers (Sidney Poitier, Bill Cosby) fix a fight and bilk mobsters by hypnotizing a bony boxer (Jimmie Walker).

programme.title: A Piece of the Action
programme.desc: Two con men (Sidney Poitier, Bill Cosby) are persuaded by a retired policeman (James Earl Jones) to volunteer their services to a ghetto youth center.

programme.title: Black Fist
programme.desc: To make money, a Los Angeles street-fighter goes to work for gangsters.

programme.title: Lord Shango
programme.desc: A tribal priest rises from the dead, unleashing his anger on non-believers.

programme.title: Solomon King
programme.desc: A man (Sal Watts) declares war on the Arabs who murdered his ex-lover.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.sub-title: Harry Belafonte; Novella Nelson; Sidney Poitier
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Harry Belafonte discuss their new film, "Buck and the Preacher"; Novella Nelson.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Ruby Dee and Ossie Davis, aided by the music of composer-saxophonist Lucky Thompson, give dramatic readings of the poetry of a writer named Robert Cornell Kaufman.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: The songwriting/performing duo Nick Ashford and Valerie Simpson.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Felipe Luciano hosts this showcase of Latin music on Soul!; musicians Tito Puente and Willie Colon are accompanied by their musical groups.

programme.title: The Harder They Come
programme.desc: An ambitious young Jamaican is forced into a life of crime after arriving in Kingston to launch a music career.

programme.title: James Brown: Mr Dynamite Unauthorized
programme.desc: An in depth look at the life of James Brown.

programme.title: Big Bad Mama
programme.desc: A woman (Angie Dickinson) drives around Texas with her daughters and gang (William Shatner, Tom Skerritt), robbing banks during the Depression.

programme.title: Bad, Black and Beautiful
programme.desc: A man turns to an unstoppable attorney (Gwynn Barbee) after he's accused of killing his boss.

programme.title: The Great Texas Dynamite Chase
programme.desc: Two women (Claudia Jennings, Jocelyn Jones) rob banks with dynamite and take a hostage (Johnny Crawford) who becomes one's lover.

programme.title: Cleopatra Jones
programme.desc: Federal agent Jones (Tamara Dobson) tries to rescue her framed boyfriend (Bernie Casey) from a drug-queen pervert known as Mommy (Shelley Winters).
